alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 10:14AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH TORRENTIAL RAINFALL WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LAURENS AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENWOOD COUNTIES UNTIL 1045 AM EDT... At 1013 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with torrential rainfall 10 miles east of Greenwood, or near Greenwood State Park, moving east at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Greenwood, Ninety Six, Cross Hill, Lake Greenwood State Park, Lake Greenwood, Greenwood State Park, Ninety Six Historic Site, Coronaca, Dyson and Kinards. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
